evidence.title: README (segment 2)
evidence.excerpt: > Not a chat wrapper. A complete command center ‚Äî orchestrate agents, run missions, track costs, and control everything from one place.

evidence.title: README (segment 3)
evidence.excerpt: - ü§ñ **Mission Control** ‚Äî Full multi-agent orchestration with an isometric office view, live agent status, and mission lifecycle management (spawn ‚Üí pause ‚Üí resume ‚Üí abort) - üìä **Cost Analytics** ‚Äî Per-agent spend, daily trends, MTD totals, and projected EOM cost backed by real gateway data - üé® **3-Theme System** ‚Äî Paper Light, Ops Dark, Premium Dark ‚Äî deep dark mode wiring across 66+ components - üîí **Security Hardened** ‚Äî Auth middleware on all API routes, wildcard CORS removed, exec approval prompts - üì± **Mobile-First PWA** ‚Äî Full feature parity on any device, installable as a native app on iOS and Android - ‚ö° **Live SSE Streaming** ‚Äî Real-time agent output streams to Mission Control and chat ‚Äî no polling - üß† **Memory Browser** ‚Äî Browse, search, and edit agent memory files directly from the UI

evidence.title: README (segment 4)

evidence.title: v3.1.0
evidence.excerpt: ## What's New ### üì± Mobile Chat Overhaul - iMessage-style composer docked edge-to-edge with keyboard-aware positioning - New bottom sheet action menu (ChatGPT-style tile grid) ‚Äî attach file + model switch in one tap - Full model picker as second bottom sheet ‚Äî browse all providers, pin/unpin, switch without leaving chat - Camera tile removed ‚Äî clean 2-tile layout - Fixed: iOS file picker no longer collapses the action sheet ### üìä Context Awareness - Context bar now always visible on mobile (was hidden below 80%) - Context alert modal wired into chat screen ‚Äî fires at 50%, 75%, and 90% usage - Threshold state persists per day via sessionStorage ### üé® UI Polish - App icon is now a true square everywhere ‚Äî fixed oval SVG viewBox (100√ó95 ‚Üí 100√ó100) - Consistent rounded-xl logo shape across all surfaces (chat, sidebar, dashboard, onboarding) - README logo rebuilt as transparent-corner PNG ‚Äî no more white corners on GitHub - Single-click sidebar collapse fixed - Compaction overlay shown across all tabs on mobile ### üóÇÔ∏è Navigation & Screens - Agent Hub: mobile/desktop consistency pass, removed redundant quick-launch bar - Missions: pill-style filter tabs, always-visible header subtit‚Ä¶

evidence.title: v3.0.0
evidence.excerpt: ## ClawSuite v3.0.0 ‚Äî 2026-02-25 ### üöÄ New Features **Agent Hub** - Agent dispatch fix: wired to `/api/agent-dispatch` (gateway RPC) ‚Äî missions now actually run - Exec approval modal: SSE-driven UI with stacked queue, 30s countdown, risk badges, auto-deny on timeout - Pause/steer fix: sends real steer signal via `chat.send` fallback - Live output panel: compact agent info, colored status badges, better progress bar **Dashboard** - Cost tracking analytics: full `/costs` page with real SQLite data ‚Äî hero KPIs, per-agent breakdown, 30-day trend chart, per-model usage table - Full dark mode consistency across all surfaces - Dynamic WebSocket origin (no more hardcoded localhost:3000) **New Screens** - Memory Browser: view, search, and edit `MEMORY.md` + `memory/*.md` in-app - Workspace File Browser: split-panel file tree, syntax highlighting, edit + save - Cost Analytics: `/costs` route with real usage data **Settings & Infrastructure** - Provider restart UX: confirm dialog ‚Üí full-screen gateway restart overlay ‚Üí health polling ‚Üí auto-dismiss - System metrics footer: persistent CPU/RAM/disk/gateway/uptime bar (off by default, toggle in Settings) - Session status fix: real gateway look‚Ä¶

evidence.title: v2.2.0
evidence.excerpt: ## ClawSuite v2.2.0 **VSCode for AI Agents** - Desktop interface for OpenClaw Gateway ### Downloads | Platform | Architecture | Download | |----------|-------------|----------| | macOS | Apple Silicon (M1/M2/M3) | `ClawSuite_*_aarch64.dmg` | | macOS | Intel | `ClawSuite_*_x64.dmg` | | Windows | 64-bit | `ClawSuite_*_x64-setup.exe` | | Linux | 64-bit | `ClawSuite_*_amd64.AppImage` | ### Installation **macOS:** Download the `.dmg`, open it, and drag ClawSuite to Applications. **Windows:** Download and run the installer. **Linux:** Download the AppImage, make it executable (`chmod +x`), and run. ### What's New - Full Dashboard with Gateway connection status - Activity Logs viewer for agent events - Browser control interface - File explorer with Monaco editor - Chat interface for agent conversations - Settings, Memory, Skills management --- Built by [@outsourc_e](https://twitter.com/outsourc_e) Learn more at [clawsuite.io](https://clawsuite.io)
